text:
Welcome to Sky Sports Formula 1 Race Control

Video Menu

Use the ARROW keys to navigate through the available video options.
Use NUMBER BUTTONS or press SELECT/OK on the highlighted option to view in full screen.
In full screen, press UP or DOWN to scroll through other video options.
The YELLOW button switches audio in On-board video.
